progressive: Progressive web applications are the latest and cutting edge technologies. They are actually websites that built using advanced web browser technologies, and they perform like mobile apps. You do not need to download anything on your device. You can access these applications using your web browser, and they will provide you the feel of a mobile app right in your web browser. These applications use service workers, which loads instantly, even in low service areas. They have a precaching feature, which keeps them updated all the time. Another big advantage of progressive web applications is that they behave like native apps. They require less space as compared to native apps and use fewer resources of the server as compared to native apps. If you are a business owner, then progressive web applications can do magic for you. Not only will they increase your conversions but also increase your revenue as they provide your users with a very pleasant experience.
